official_title: To require the Commissioner of Customs to provide certain facilities and equipment at the port of entry at Trout River, New York.

summary.text: Requires the Commissioner of Customs to provide, as part of the Northern Border Enhancement Program, certain facilities and equipment at the port of entry at Trout River, New York.

titles.title: To require the Commissioner of Customs to provide certain facilities and equipment at the port of entry at Trout River, New York.
